subject: Gallery updated

full_text:

I posted a few more pics in the gallery http://webcamitc.myphotoalbum.com/ including a couple of the crystal/water ones. Using light reflection/refraction off a rock rather than a feedback loop or tv light source is definitely different for me. Sometimes it looks as if the crystal becomes "charged" with light...shifts...and then the faces get clear. Often you see it as you record. Pretty neat.
   
  Misty
